dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Football DataCo Fixture Lists 2005/06 - DataCo_NBCAD_13303]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, April 19, 2006 11:02 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Football DataCo Fixture Lists 2005/06 -
DataCo_NBCAD_13303]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Football DataCo Fixture Lists 2005/06 -
DataCo_NBCAD_13303
Date: Wed, 19 Apr 2006 16:38:33 +0100
From: Phil Stubbs <phils@nr-online.com>
To: <foxj77@hotmail.com>
CC: abuse@theplanet.com


Dear Sirs,

DataCo_NBCAD_13303

We write on behalf of the Football Data Co Limited which is the
appointed licensee of the FA Premier League, the Football League, the
Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football League ("the Leagues")
in respect of the licensing of certain intellectual property rights of
the Leagues, including those in the fixture lists for this season August
2005 - May
2006 ("the Fixture Lists"), for use by third parties.

We have noticed that your website
http://www.freepremiershiponline.com is
displaying Football Fixtures. In order to display the Fixture Lists you
must either obtain the necessary license from Football DataCo
(dfolker@football-dataco.com) or be an officially nominated fanzine for
your chosen club. If you are not nominated as the official club fanzine
and you do not wish to purchase a fixture license you can post a link to
your club official site.

Without nominated fanzine status or a license there is no provision for
any fixture to appear in advance of the match being played. However, if
there is an editorial preview of the next upcoming match in which the
fixture is mentioned then this is unlikely to be objected to, provided
this is done in a clearly editorial form. Mentioning more than one
fixture would not be accepted.


Formal Declaration

1. I hereby state Football DataCo are the owners of the exclusive rights
to the copyrighted material and that NetResult are authorised to act on
their behalf.

2. On behalf of the owners of the exclusive right to the copyrighted
material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good
faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I, Philip Stubbs, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.



We thank you for your cooperation.

Yours sincerely,

Philip Stubbs

NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House,
583 Fulham Road,
London
UK
SW6 5UA





-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFERl71vK/XpJs6oyURAjn8AJ9RWNGeEHVg815b4hGSO+G76uELJQCdE27C
hoZF/dVRhrOI9hXtWe2HNKE=
=/1k4
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
